input.sentences: actors came together for an impromptu play .
it was very lively and the cast proved energetic .
there were a few touching scenes included as well .
a few forgot their lines with such short time to prepare but played it off rather well .
overall the play was a big success and a lot of fun for all .
output.sentences: Two guys read a letter in a play.
